definition: Delhi/New Delhi, capital of India/same as 新德里[Xin1 De2 li3]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Fredericton, capital of New Brunswick, Canada
pinyin: Fu2 lei2 de2 li3 ke4 dun4

definition: Friedrich Schiller or Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller (1759-1805), German poet and dramatist
pinyin: Fu2 li3 de2 li3 xi1 · Xi2 le4

definition: Jean Baudrillard (1929-2007), French cultural theorist and philosopher

sentences.english: A few days ago, Adrian bought six bottles of ink at a $1 Store.
sentences.chinese: 幾天前，阿德里恩買了六瓶墨水在1美元商店。

sentences.english: And if Baudrillard can't be understood, then he can't be misunderstood, either.
sentences.chinese: 如果鮑德里亞不能被理解，那他就不會被誤解。

sentences.english: Sign value is the central concept of Baudrillard's sign culture theory.
sentences.chinese: 符號價值是鮑德里亞符號文化理論的中心。

sentences.english: Who do you like best, Tom or Derek?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜歡誰，湯姆還是德里克？

sentences.english: Rumour has it that he is positioning himself to take over from Mr Papandreou.
sentences.chinese: 有傳言稱這是因爲他要取代潘帕德里歐的位子。

sentences.english: Madrid, a city of night-walking dancers and day-drinking scholars. A city of pleasure and pain.
sentences.chinese: 馬德里，舞者夜行文人晝飲之痛並快樂城市。

sentences.english: The picture shows a hawker used the police signs resist rain in Delhi.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲德里，一名小販利用警察局招牌擋雨。

sentences.english: In 1969, Gadhafi overthrew the Eastern tribal King Idris.
sentences.chinese: 1969年，卡扎菲推翻了東部的部落酋長伊德里斯。

sentences.english: So I made the four-hour trip from Zaragoza to Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 於是我花了四個小時從薩拉戈薩趕往馬德里。

sentences.english: Jakob thinks that Adrienne doesn’t know I stole the jewels.
sentences.chinese: 雅克布認爲阿德里安娜不知道我偷了珠寶。

sentences.english: But if Aguero wants to go to Real Madrid, tough luck for us.
sentences.chinese: 但如果阿圭羅想要去皇家馬德里，對我們來說是黴運。

sentences.english: Deryck and I are separating and moving forward on a positive note.
sentences.chinese: 德里克和我已經分居，我們正朝着積極的方向努力。

sentences.english: Airdrie, you were my best friend and my closest connection.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾德里你是我最好的朋友和最親密的人。

sentences.english: Midori give life with her colors.
sentences.chinese: 而馬德里賦予了我生命的顏色。

sentences.english: Thanks to Jostein Risa for the translation.
sentences.chinese: 由於喬斯坦賈德里沙的翻譯。

sentences.english: 2006 – Madrid Barajas International Airport is bombed.
sentences.chinese: 2006年的今天，馬德里巴拉哈斯國際機場被轟炸。

definition: Dhaka, capital of Bangladesh/(Tw) Dakar, capital of Senegal
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Chandighar, capital of Punjab state of northwest India
Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Pune, second city of Mahārāshtra 馬哈拉施特拉邦|马哈拉施特拉邦 in western India
